channel.title: How do u add npcs to where u want?
channel.description: Topic says it all but can some1 give me the steps by steps and if i need to do control-f tell me what t type in

item.title: How do u add npcs to where u want?
item.dc:creator: @pelta pelta
item.description:
@pelta wrote:

ok (eg) open auto spawn you should see this
//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
under you will see something like this
spawn = ~~~ #### **** 0 0 0 0 0 1
spawn = ~~~ #### **** 0 0 0 0 0 1
this means cord x #### this means cord y **** yhis is you npc id ~~~
just add the cords to were you want it to be then put the npc id to wot ever the npc id is

Read full topic
item.source: How do u add npcs to where u want?
